definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: He is learning to add and subtract.
Discussed the addition and subtraction from basic shape to the product appearance shape deeply.
sentences.chinese: 深入探讨从基本形到产品外观造型加减法。

sentences.english: Having thus mastered addition, they move on to subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 如此这般地掌握了加法之后，他们又转向减法。

sentences.english: Soul grows more by substraction than by addition.
sentences.chinese: 减法比加法更能使灵魂成长。

sentences.english: It's a subtractive color space based on the way inks work.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个减法色彩空间的道路上油墨工作的基础。

sentences.english: The danger:students who can not even do simple subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 很危险的是，一些学生甚至连简单的加减法都不会做。

sentences.english: An approach to speech-sound enhancement is proposed based on the spectral subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于谱减法的语音增强算法。

sentences.english: The children are learning to add and subtract.
You are poor at double-digit addition and subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 你不擅长两位数的加减法。

sentences.english: You should also see the return values of the add and subtract operations.
sentences.chinese: 您也应该看到加法操作和减法操作的返回值。

sentences.english: Learn to add responsibly instead of subtracting.
sentences.chinese: 学会负负责任地使用加法并取代减法。

sentences.english: Practise addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, until all the cards are gone.
sentences.chinese: 练习加减法，直到所有卡片都被移走。

sentences.english: The little girl has begun to learn to add and subtract.
sentences.chinese: 这小女孩已在学做加减法了。

sentences.english: In their first year at school, most children learn to ADD and subtract.
sentences.chinese: 入学第一年，多数孩子学习加减法。

sentences.english: you also learn how to add and subtract in your head.
sentences.chinese: 你也应该学会加减法的心算。

sentences.english: Master the method of doing addition and subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 掌握整十数加减法的计算方法。

definition: four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
to alleviate a burden on sb
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
